sentences.sContent: He tries to counterfeit all the good things God offers you, aiming at our weakness in order to exploit our vulnerabilities and entice us into the darkness.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tries to counterfeit all the good things God offers you, aiming at our weakness in order to exploit our vulnerabilities and entice us into the darkness.
sentences.sCn: 他试图假冒所有上帝提供给我们的好事情，针对我们的弱点，以便开发我们的缺点，诱使我们进入黑暗。

sentences.sContent: The higher rate would entice banks to tie up money they otherwise might lend to customers or other banks.
sentences.sContent_eng: The higher rate would entice banks to tie up money they otherwise might lend to customers or other banks.
sentences.sCn: 更高的利率将诱使银行收回流动性，减少向客户或其它银行发放贷款的数量。

remMethod.val: ent(看作enter， 进入) + ice(冰) → 引诱人进入冰中 → 引诱

words.tran: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tranOther: to persuade someone to do something or go somewhere, usually by offering them something that they want
